knimeNode.name: Alignment Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Saves one or more alignments to disk

fullDescription.intro: Saves an alignment cell column (consisting of one or more alignments) to disk in the specified format. This node is useful for making KNIME alignments available to other programs eg. PAUP, Mesquite or Java PAL.
fullDescription.option: Folder to save alignments (one file per alignment cell) to
Only CLUSTALW/X is supported for now
Column which contains the alignment cells

ports.inPort: Input data containing a column of an Alignments eg. MUSCLE EBI node
